full_summary:
## **Laboratory Consumables and Equipment Contract**

**Reference Number**: cb-9156-84041580  
**Publication Date**: 2023-09-18  
**Closing Date for Tenders**: 2023-10-09 14:00:00  
**Tender Status**: Exired  
**Official Language(s)**: English - French

**Procurement Details:**

* This Request for Tender (RFT) is open to suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI.
* The Department of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) Toronto is seeking vendors for the procurement of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies.
* DRDC Toronto has a requirement for the following items:
	+ Handheld Decapper 8-CH Matrix
	+ Rotor SS F21S-48x1.5 ea
	+ Adapters for Thermo Scientific MicroClick 30
	+ Tube Screwtop 500uL UL2D V-BT, purple cap
	+ Tube Screwtop 500uL UL2D V-BT, red cap
	+ ScrewTube 500UL with colorless cap
	+ BD PAXgene Blood RNA Tube
* The contract will be for a duration of one year following the date of delivery and acceptance.

**Additional Information:**

* Vendors must have a valid Supply Arrangement with Public Works and Government Services Canada for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies.
* The contract will be awarded based on lowest price to the responsive bidder that meets the mandatory technical criteria.
* Delivery of the equipment is expected within 2 months after contract award.

## **Trade Agreements:**

* This procurement is governed by the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## **Contact Information:**

* Name: Marie-Claude
